name: Pretty Much PGMA
description:
This shoot 'em up retells the fourth season of the Pixel Game Maker's Awards, the season I took part in! Play as Gherwit as he blasts away the competition and takes the crown!

Instructions:

[Arrow Keys] or [WASD] to MOVE

[Z] to SHOOT

Hold [H] when pressing the green flag to enter Hard Mode!

Credits:

Color palette is called "punolit." I found it on Lospec.com

All music is by squirrelsRcool on scratch (aka - How2Bboss - on youtube)

The characters in this game reference the works of amazing pixel artists Gherwit, haywireSSC, -ArtyPixelCode12-, thepixelist, Skellien, Zythexar, WilderNaut, dakpok, and SayinSkull-Games.
